Headline: CTA Train Tracker May Be Temporarily Unavailable
ShortDescription: Info from CTA Train Tracker may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is not affected.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Information from CTA Train Tracker SM may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is unaffected.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are standing at Howard due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are standing at Howard due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #97 Skokie

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
